actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5 of the United States Code with respect to the observance of Veterans' Day.

summary.text: Designates November 11 of each year as Veterans' Day and makes such day a legal public holiday.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5 of the United States Code with respect to the observance of Veterans' Day.
